title: TokenMe.w
author: TokenMe.w
content: I am looking for a bounty manager to manage, promote and increase my project social presence especially in twitter for 5 months. My salary per month is $400 which i will pay $200 every 2 weeks I am looking for someone with a good record of actually making good progress with the twitter popularity of the project, ensuring activities, trending activities, and telegram activities.Â submit your applications to me via my inbox in bitcoin talk

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Feel free to contact me by telegram @sujonali1819Here is my service thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5231849.0

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: There are many good managers here on the forum, and maybe some of them want to work with you, but the payment is considered low compared to the required tasks, especially if the manager is working on several other projects at the same time. Also i can't tell if they accept working with altcoin projects.Better to describe your project here in public before passing to private. This will ensure more transparency and credibility.I have never worked as a campaign manager here on the forum, but I think I can help with the goals you want to reach after discussing the rest of the details. But make sure that you can't increase your project social presence by investing just $100/week.I will send you a private message containing my telegram username. Maybe i can help with more constructive suggestions after well understanding the concept of your project and your targeted goals.

comments.author: nlovric
comments.created_time: May 28, 2023, 05:53:23 PMLast edit: May 28, 2023, 06:09:49 PM by nlovric
comments.body: Hello Dear,If you want your Bounty to be successful and promote your project well you can contact these Manager and search for their past management activities in their ANN threads, including Signature and Bounty Social media like Twitter, Facebook, Telegram etcHhampuz: Hhampuz Campaign Management, Escrow Service & Promotions | Available Now!yahoo62278: yahoo62278 Campaign Management services(telegram @yahoo62278)irfan_pak10: [BountyPortals.com] Signature Campaign Management Services [Campaign Manager] sujonali1819: ðŸ’  Sujonali1819 ðŸ’  Campaign Management Service ðŸ’  Signature ðŸ’  Bounty ðŸ’  ContestCryptopreneurBrainboss: ðŸ‘‰ BrainBoss Managerial Service ðŸ‘ˆ[ANN, Signature & Bounty - Meme, GameFi, DeFi]Royse777: ðŸ’¹ðŸ“ˆ Bitcointalk Campaign Management ðŸ’ªðŸ”¥ Signature & BountyThese are all professional managers so you can contact any one of them to run your bounty and you can also reach out to others as well.Best of Luck

Not sure if this user is looking to run a bounty or if only wants someone managing their twitter account either. OP should clarify a little for those interested.

comments.author: irfan_pak10
comments.body: I dont think he is looking for a bounty manager, the correct position for this task is marketing manager specializing in social media marketing.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on May 28, 2023, 05:24:42 PMI am looking for a bounty manager to manage, promote and increase my project social presence especially in twitter for 5 months. My salary per month is $400 which i will pay $200 every 2 weeks I am looking for someone with a good record of actually making good progress with the twitter popularity of the project, ensuring activities, trending activities, and telegram activities.Â submit your applications to me via my inbox in bitcoin talkI am a social media marketer. I am working on freelancer.com since 2014 as a professional social media marketer. So, I can ensure you that I would be able to help you to promote your social media pages to promote your business. You can reach me via my telegram (mentioned on my profile), or message me on the forum.Payment terms: You have to pay upfront or you have to use escrow as you have no reputation on the forum.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: irfan_pak10 on May 28, 2023, 06:50:34 PMI dont think he is looking for a bounty manager, the correct position for this task is marketing manager specializing in social media marketing.Â  You are correct, if he has a bounty manager he could easily increase his followers because bounty managers have their own channels, followers, and bounty hunters he will just ask people to follow this account and everything will roll up he can also ask his followers and bounty hunters to share and like those tweets, with a bounty hunter, he'll struggle to find followers and grow his media.So my recommendation is to hire someone who knows how to do the job and is already an influencer.

comments.author: Zetfexboo59
comments.body: I'm a social media manager.Â  I can help boost your business to the next level. Though your pay is small, I'll need a raise.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: You must have been confused about the role of bounty manager because all they can bring is bunch of shitty followers (usually bots with no actual reach and that won't help your projects whatsoever.What you actually need is an experienced social media manager who will grow your social media presence organically and I am not sure that you will find someone capable of doing that within that budget. Either way good luck and I hope that you find someone.

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on May 28, 2023, 05:24:42 PMI am looking for a bounty manager to manage, promote and increase my project social presence especially in twitter for 5 months. It looks like op is looking for a community manager based on his description. He needs someone to manage his project community on Twitter so it can increase the social media activities which is cool. We have some good bounty managers here that can do the work but the pay looks too small for them to accept since it's just $100 per week. Maybe op can give a little description of what the job of the manager would be, so those would are interested can kindly zoom in knowing what there duty entails. If the description of job is known that would reduce the urge of acquiring about what the job of the manager would be.
